resources:
Nombre app</--> DietApp Calendar
Fragments</--> Diet Recipes Add recipe Recipe details Edit recipe Edit the diet Settings
Comidas</--> Breakfast Mid-morning meal Lunch Snack Dinner
Días semana</--> Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday Sunday
Botones generar dieta</--> Make a diet Edit Regenerate PDF
Recetas</--> Search by name... Add new recipe Edit recipe Share recipe Name Categories Add ingredient button Add recipe button Cooking Ingredients Link to recipe Calories approx. (kcal) Add Time for this meal Delete recipe You have already added The recipe requires at least:\n A name\n A category\n If it is a complete meal, first course or accompaniment\n The time at which this dish is eaten This recipe already exists
Yes No Ok Copy shopping list List copied to clipboard Operation has been canceled Delete? Are you sure to delete this delicious recipe
Share with Backup created in: Restore? Are you sure you want to restore the backup? This option will delete ALL existing data and cannot be undone
Generar dieta <--> You need at least one accompaniment for your first dish To create a diet for the type of diet you are using, you need \n 7 complete meals or 7 first dishes with their accompaniment for midday\n 7 complete dinners or 7 first dishes for dinner along with their accompaniment\n 1 breakfast\n You can create them in the Recipes menu. You need at least 7 full or combined dinners for the type of diet you are using You need at least 1 breakfast PDF saved in: Error saving PDF Recipe created successfully! There is no diet currently made Diet type Favorite recipes for the next diet Update preferences WeeklyMenu_
Opciones <--> Backup Use dark theme Language Firebase Google Drive Backup created successfully! First day of week Create backup Restore backup
Botones de explicar cosas <--> Button to regenerate the current diet Button to go to the diet preferences menu Add a new recipe Edit this recipe Send this recipe to a friend! No diet created. Create your first diet now Help This value is informational only. Not used when you make a diet I have read and understand the use of this app DietApp Calendar DOES NOT replace a nutritionist. This app is designed for people who know and understand a minimum of how to diet. Please, if you do not know how to select foods for a correct diet, go to an expert. Welcome! Welcome to DietApp Calendar. To start creating a diet, you need:\n 7 complete meals or 7 first dishes along with their accompaniment for midday\n 7 complete dinners or 7 first dishes for dinner along with their accompaniment\n 1 breakfast\n You can create them in the Recipes menu. This is the recipe menu. Here you can see and create your own recipes. You can start creating them with the button below on the right This is the menu to create a recipe. A recipe needs at least:\n A name\n A category\n If it is a complete meal, first dish or accompaniment\n The time at which this dish is eaten\n You can now start creating your delicious recipes! Recetas de prueba <--> Roasted chicken with potatoes Hamburger with tomato fresh sausages Seafood salpico pear salad turkey fillet Mushroom sauté tuna salad Toasts with grated tomato This is a recipe. You can use it, edit it, or delete it Loin with sauce Meatballs with sauce Fish with vegetables Omelet with ham Fish with onion sauce Macaroni with tomato Lentils with chorizo Vegetable puree Chicken Loin meatballs Fish Potatoes Onion Macaroni fried tomato Lentils Sausage Eggs Vegetables Ham Sausages Seafood Hamburguer Tomato Pear Lettuce Mushrooms Bread Tuna
Categorías para buscar recetas</-->
